DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine well combination medication , sumatriptan naproxen sodium , treat migraine headache adolescent 12-17 year old
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether combination product , sumatriptan naproxen sodium , effective compare placebo treatment acute migraine adolescent subject 12-17 year old . Subjects treat two migraine attack ~25 week period .
